casebody.data:
CLARK, II
v.
DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC SAFETY 190P16-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 16, 2017 *6Joseph Earl Clark, II, for Clark, Joseph Earl (II). Kristin Jo Uicker, Assistant Attorney General, Kristy M. Newton, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Joseph Finarelli, Special Deputy Attorney General, for N.C. Department of Public Safety.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th of January 2017 by Petitioner for Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of March 2017."
